title: Drawing, "Three Rectangles: Cupid in Chariot Drawn by Horses; Cupid in Chariot Drawn by Swans; Cupid in Chariot drawn by Lions", ca. 1820
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: amor domator delli animali; ratto Proserpina; Giove Leda; Ercole Jole
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Three Rectangles: Cupid in Chariot Drawn by Horses; Cupid in Chariot Drawn by Swans; Cupid in Chariot drawn by Lions", ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1196.
